hints.title: Hypocoercive LSI for Kinetic Operator (Reference)
hints.content:
3862: :label: thm-kinetic-lsi-reference
3863: 
3864: The kinetic operator $\Psi_{\text{kin}}(\tau)$ with Langevin dynamics satisfies:
3865: 
3866: $$
3867: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) \leq (1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)
3868: $$
3869: 
3870: where:
3871: $$
3872: \alpha_{\text{kin}} = O(\gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}})
3873: $$
3874: 
3875: with $\gamma$ the friction coefficient and $\kappa_{\text{conf}}$ the convexity constant of the confining potential.
3876: 
3877: **Proof**: See Theorem 3.4 (lines 495-553) and Section 2 (lines 200-494) of [09_kl_convergence](09_kl_convergence).
